author: Andreas
content:
Alienation? Well, could be ðŸ™‚

This was "my" fence for 20 years, soon it won't be any more. Otoh, I always like fences. They make nice rhythms and patterns, they vanish gracefully in the distance, and with age they get more and more interesting. My blog entries tagged "Fence" probably talk more about my general love of these qualities. Thus I answer with a resounding maybe ðŸ™‚
